entry.title: Coconutty
entry.content:
You are very coconutty,
sweet, pristine and tough.
Curse the catty force that made you
vanish in one puff.
All the hearts are desiccated
and the mood is rough.
We want more of your kind spirit,
it was not enough.
entry.summary: You are very coconutty, sweet, pristine and tough. Curse the catty force that made you vanish in one puff. All the hearts are desiccated and the mood is rough. We want more of your kind spirit, it was not enough.

entry.title: Big Ray
entry.content:
When sun peeked out one gloomy day,
ray pierced the cloud, showed us the way.
Now the mood is flat...
we miss the cravat.
Fare well and fair play, may your life never be grey!
entry.summary: When sun peeked out one gloomy day, ray pierced the cloud, showed us the way. Now the mood is flat... we miss the cravat. Fare well and fair play, may your life never be grey!

entry.title: Tree
entry.content:
Look up, she’s on the tree
looking happy and free
aiming to be the best P
M you will ever see.


Picture source: unknown
entry.summary: Look up, she’s on the tree looking happy and free aiming to be the best P M you will ever see.

entry.title: Mischievous Gale
entry.content:
Will you stop you mischievous gale
hiding the gifts with your tail!
All the reindeer are pouting
and the elves are scouting
hoping… not to miss
Christmas Day.

Artwork: original (printed on A6 folded cards)
entry.summary: Will you stop you mischievous gale hiding the gifts with your tail! All the reindeer are pouting and the elves are scouting hoping… not to miss Christmas Day.

entry.title: Soggy Fur
entry.content:
soggy fur, sappy eyes,
a defeated puppy
wandering through the dark
woods, lonely, unhappy

tired, sat on a stone
frozen to the marrow
out of nowhere…
a song of a happy sparrow

but it wasn’t a bird,
‘twas strange orange contraption
that kept ringing, and ringing
with force of attraction

he picked up,
and i think you know
how this story ends…

Be happy my Angels you’ve been wonderful friends!!

Artwork: original (printed on A6 folded cards)
entry.summary: soggy fur, sappy eyes, a defeated puppy wandering through the dark woods, lonely, unhappy

entry.title: Twinkle Twinkle
entry.content:
i saw a twinkle
not too far
it’s something locked up
in a jar

i came up closer
touched it lightly
it wasn’t screwed on
very tightly

a sudden flare;
my eyelids torn
and there…
a little star is born
entry.summary: i saw a twinkle not too far it’s something locked up in a jar i came up closer touched it lightly it wasn’t screwed on very tightly a sudden flare; my eyelids torn and there… a little star is born

entry.title: Out Of Office
entry.content:
Good morning, Dearest, or good afternoon!
Did you miss me? Well, I did miss you too,
and before you start howling at the moon,
know that I’ll be back very, very soon.

Yours faithfully,
Grizzled Sheepdog
entry.summary: Good morning, Dearest, or good afternoon! Did you miss me? Well, I did miss you too, and before you start howling at the moon, know that I’ll be back very, very soon. Yours faithfully, Grizzled Sheepdog

entry.title: Dozy
entry.content:
This day has been rather rosy
but now I need some place cosy
I need to lay my head,
do I have a bed?
I don’t know… life’s too hard… and I am too dozy.


Picture source: unknown
entry.summary: This day has been rather rosy but now I need some place cosy I need to lay my head, do I have a bed? I don’t know… life’s too hard… and I am too dozy.

entry.title: Shrew
entry.content:
Helloooo…
my name is Shrew…
Elephant Shrew…
born and bred Pomeranian…
who just had a hair cut…


Picture source: unknown
entry.summary: Helloooo… my name is Shrew… Elephant Shrew… born and bred Pomeranian… who just had a hair cut…

entry.title: Little Violin
entry.content:
One cold morning I felt an urge to bake
Well, why don’t I try a banana cake?

Easier said than done,
I have never made one.

Let’s try classifieds… there’s one with a stylish pin
spelled in Cyrillic: LITTLE VIOLIN.

So I called, trembling, with confidence all fluffy,
but she was a cuteheart, sweeter than a puppy.

I got a recipe that looked simple but be not mistaken:
she knows much more about baking than how to rock an apron!

I tried it and went to heaven…

HEAVEN TIMES ELEVEN !! !! !!

And if you think I’m joking, trying to make you laugh,
just visit her café, and ask one of the staff.


Picture source: unknown
Artwork: original (printed on A5 folded card)
entry.summary: One cold morning I felt an urge to bake Well, why don’t I try a banana cake? Easier said than done, I have never made one. Let’s try classifieds… there’s one with a stylish pin spelled in Cyrillic: LITTLE VIOLIN. So I called, trembling, with confidence all fluffy, but she was a cuteheart, sweeter than a puppy. I got a recipe that looked simple but be not mistaken: she knows much more about baking than how to rock an apron! I tried it and went to heaven…
